verses.verse: Then Solomon<WH8010> began<WH2490> to build<WH1129> the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> at Jerusalem<WH3389> in mount<WH2022> Moriah,<WH4179> where<WH834> the Lord appeared<WH7200> to David<WH1732> his father,<WH25> in the place<WH4725> that David<WH1732> had prepared<WH3559> in the threshing floor<WH1637> of Ornan<WH771> the Jebusite.<WH2983>
And he began<WH2490> to build<WH1129> in the second<WH8145> day of the second<WH8145> month,<WH2320> in the fourth<WH702> year<WH8141> of his reign.<WH4438>

Now these<WH428> are the things wherein Solomon<WH8010> was instructed<WH3245> for the building<WH1129> of the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430> The length<WH753> by cubits<WH520> after the first<WH7223> measure<WH4060> was three score<WH8346> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> twenty<WH6242> cubits.<WH520>

And the porch<WH197> that was in the front<WH6440> of the house, the length<WH753> of it was according<WH5921> to the breadth<WH7341> of the house,<WH1004> twenty<WH6242> cubits,<WH520> and the height<WH1363> was an hundred<WH3967> and twenty:<WH6242> and he overlaid<WH6823> it within<WH6441> with pure<WH2889> gold.<WH2091>

And the greater<WH1419> house<WH1004> he paneled<WH2645> with fir<WH1265> tree,<WH6086> which he overlaid<WH2645> with fine<WH2896> gold,<WH2091> and set<WH5927> thereon<WH5921> palm<WH8561> trees and chains.<WH8333>
And he garnished<WH6823> the house<WH1004> with precious<WH3368> stones<WH68> for beauty:<WH8597> and the gold<WH2091> was gold<WH2091> of Parvaim.<WH6516>

He overlaid<WH2645> also the house,<WH1004> the beams,<WH6982> the posts,<WH5592> and the walls<WH7023> thereof, and the doors<WH1817> thereof, with gold;<WH2091> and graved<WH6605> cherubim<WH3742> on<WH5921> the walls.<WH7023>

And he made<WH6213> the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> house,<WH1004> the length<WH753> whereof was according<WH5921> to the breadth<WH7341> of the house,<WH1004> twenty<WH6242> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> thereof twenty<WH6242> cubits:<WH520> and he overlaid<WH2645> it with fine<WH2896> gold,<WH2091> amounting to six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> talents.<WH3603>
And the weight<WH4948> of the nails<WH4548> was fifty<WH2572> shekels<WH8255> of gold.<WH2091> And he overlaid<WH2645> the upper<WH5944> chambers<WH5944> with gold.<WH2091>
And in the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> house<WH1004> he made<WH6213> two<WH8147> cherubim<WH3742> of image<WH6816> work,<WH4639> and overlaid<WH6823> them with gold.<WH2091>

And the wings<WH3671> of the cherubim<WH3742> were twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520> long:<WH753> one<WH259> wing<WH3671> of the one cherub was five<WH2568> cubits,<WH520> reaching<WH5060> to the wall<WH7023> of the house:<WH1004> and the other<WH312> wing<WH3671> was likewise five<WH2568> cubits,<WH520> reaching<WH5060> to the wing<WH3671> of the other<WH312> cherub.<WH3742>

And one wing<WH3671> of the other<WH259> cherub<WH3742> was five<WH2568> cubits,<WH520> reaching<WH5060> to the wall<WH7023> of the house:<WH1004> and the other<WH312> wing<WH3671> was five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> also, joining<WH1692> to the wing<WH3671> of the other<WH312> cherub.<WH3742>

The wings<WH3671> of these<WH428> cherubim<WH3742> spread<WH6566> themselves forth twenty<WH6242> cubits:<WH520> and they stood<WH5975> on<WH5921> their feet,<WH7272> and their faces<WH6440> were inward.<WH1004>
And he made<WH6213> the veil<WH6532> of blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and crimson,<WH3758> and fine linen,<WH948> and worked<WH5927> cherubim<WH3742> thereon.<WH5921>

Also he made<WH6213> before<WH6440> the house<WH1004> two<WH8147> pillars<WH5982> of thirty<WH7970> and five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> high,<WH753> and the capital<WH6858> that was on<WH5921> the top<WH7218> of each of them was five<WH2568> cubits.<WH520>

And he made<WH6213> chains,<WH8333> as in the oracle,<WH1687> and put<WH5414> them on<WH5921> the heads<WH7218> of the pillars;<WH5982> and made<WH6213> an hundred<WH3967> pomegranates,<WH7416> and put<WH5414> them on the chains.<WH8333>

And he reared<WH6965> up the pillars<WH5982> before<WH5921> <WH6440> the temple,<WH1964> one<WH259> on the right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> and the other<WH259> on the left;<WH8040> and called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of that on the right<WH3227> hand<WH3227> Jachin,<WH3199> and the name<WH8034> of that on the left<WH8042> Boaz.<WH1162>
